ItemDesc: Upon use, increases DMG taken by all enemies by <unbreak>12%</unbreak> in the next battle, lasting for 5 turns.
ItemBGDesc: There is a psychological theory that goes like this: When you hear negative news about a stranger, you only remember "there is negative news about this person," but not the negative news itself. By applying this principle, you can use the mass media to leave a negative impression of someone without needing any credible negative news sources. "Detest those who destroy entire countries with cunning words."
